mdRecord.dcterms:title: Distinguished visitors
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Notation on back, "Edward R. Stettinius, Jr., rector of the University of Virginia, Dr. V.K. Wellington Koo, Chinese Ambasssador to U.S. and Admiral William F. Halsey, Jr., chairman of the national council of the University of Virginia Fund Campaign, pictured at the University before Dr. Koo delivered the third in a series of public lectures by prominent statesmen sponsored by the Woodrow Wilson School of Foreign Affairs."
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: University of Virginia Visual History Collection
